titleStmt.title: Remains of Mr. John Oldham in verse and prose
titleStmt.author: Oldham, John, 1653-1683.

notesStmt.note: "To the memory of Mr. Charles Morwent ...": (p. [69]-114) has special t.p.
Among the introductory tributes are "To the memory of Mr. Oldham", by John Dryden, and "On the ensuing poems ...", by Thomas D'Urfey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
